name: Forewarn
short-desc: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.
long-desc: When this Pokemon enters battle, it reveals the move with the highest base power known by any opposing Pokemon to all participating trainers.  In the event of a tie, one is chosen at random.  Moves without a listed base power are assigned one as follows:  Power | Moves ----: | -----   160 | One-hit KO moves: , , , and    120 | Counter moves: , , and     80 | Variable power or set damage: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and      0 | Any such move not listed
